summary.title: Summary
summary.content: With a comprehensive 20-year tenure in HR, my expertise spans the full gamut—from recruiting and HR business partnering to learning and development, and notably, constructing HR infrastructures from the ground up. I have shaped high-performing cultures across diverse organizational landscapes, including technology, travel, consulting, banking, and fintech. My passion for developing talent has led me to engineer innovative learning and assessment strategies, elevating skills, leadership capabilities, and business acumen across all workforce levels. As a collaborative leader and trusted advisor, I am dedicated to cultivating an environment where talent thrives, and business objectives are seamlessly achieved.

team.name: Talent and Capability Building
team.description: Strategic advisor to C-suite and business leaders, focusing on people capability development, culture, and talent management. Successfully led talent initiatives across various sectors including business, corporate, engineering, and product, impacting over 2,400 employees.

responsibilities.description: Established the learning and capability development function, incorporating digital tools and effectiveness metrics, and refined key talent processes such as performance management and succession planning. Spearheaded organization-wide functional academies, peer and social learning, mentorship programs, and compliance trainings, managing a talent budget of $370K.
Drove organizational excellence by overseeing employee relations, resolving disputes, discrimination issues, and terminations, with a focus on preventing POSH harassment and discrimination.

Fostered a culture of proactive performance management through coaching and collaboration with managers to raise performance standards. Developed a leadership framework and coached leaders to enhance their effectiveness in current and future roles.

Directed organizational transformation initiatives to cultivate an inclusive, diverse culture and well-being, achieving higher employee engagement scores. Championed women mentorship, inclusion forums, inclusive work policies, and diversity workshops.
